stories.original_headline: Scientists discover hidden deep-Earth structures shaping the magnetic field
stories.original_summary: Deep inside Earth, two massive hot rock structures have been quietly shaping the planet’s magnetic field for millions of years. Using ancient magnetic records and advanced simulations, scientists discovered that these formations influence the movement of liquid iron in Earth’s core. Some parts of th
stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Earth-Giants Stir the Planet's Magical Aura!
stories.fantasy_story: Wise Alchemists have found two colossal rock forms deep within the world, quietly guiding the Earth's magical aura for ages. Using old enchanted maps and mystical visions, they learned these giants sway the molten heart of the world. Their powerful magic shapes the very ley lines we rely on.

stories.original_headline: Endangered sea turtles hear ship noise loud and clear
stories.original_summary: Kemp’s ridley sea turtles, one of the most endangered sea turtle species on Earth, live in some of the noisiest waters on the planet, right alongside major shipping routes. New research reveals that these turtles are especially sensitive to low-frequency sounds—the same rumbling tones produced by sh
stories.fantasy_headline: Rare Sea Guardians Disturbed by Loud Merchant Vessels.
stories.fantasy_story: The gentle, ancient Sea Guardians, known as Kemp's ridleys, face peril in the loudest ocean paths near busy trade routes. Marine Wizards discovered these rare creatures hear the deep rumbling of great merchant vessels all too clearly. This constant din troubles their peaceful existence in the vast waters.

stories.original_headline: Nvidia’s RTX 50-series Super refresh is delayed, and the RTX 60-series might miss 2027
stories.original_summary: The Super refresh to Nvidia's RTX 50-series GPUs was expected at CES 2026 in January, but it didn't make an appearance. The Information reports that in December, Nvidia managers decided not to release the new cards as scheduled, choosing to prioritize AI chips instead due to the limited supply of RA
stories.fantasy_headline: Grand Forgemasters Delay New Scrying Mirrors for Magical Golems.
stories.fantasy_story: The renowned Forgemasters of the Silicon Peaks have postponed their next line of enchanted viewing crystals, the 'RTX 50-series Super'. Guild elders chose to focus their rare Etherium crystal supply on crafting more powerful calculating golems instead. Thus, even the mighty 'RTX 60-series' might not appear by the year 2027.

stories.original_headline: PlayStation’s live service push continues with a co-op Horizon spinoff
stories.original_summary: Sony is expanding its Horizon universe again with Horizon Hunters Gathering, a "cooperative action game" in development by franchise creator Guerrilla for PS5 and PC. Horizon Hunters Gathering lets "up to three players team up as heroic Hunters to protect a world under threat from deadly machines,"
stories.fantasy_headline: New Adventure Announced: Heroes Unite to Battle Clockwork Beasts!
stories.fantasy_story: The Scrollkeepers' Guild of Sony has unveiled a grand new quest in the lands of the Sundered Dawn. Titled "Horizon Hunters Gathering," this co-operative adventure allows up to three brave heroes to join forces. Together, they will defend the world from fearsome ancient clockwork beasts, playable on enchanted viewing orbs.
